document_data.mainbody:
Gnomish Hand-Firing Techniques was a reference book detailing gnomish techniques of forging firearms.Though exact details about the book are not provided within the adventure, its possible this text refers to the gnomes of Lantan as they developed firearms and the smokepowder necessary to use them.
One copy of this tome laid within Bard Keep, a temple of Oghma that stood within the North near Silverymoon.
